title: The Last Kings Of Kong FiveThirtyEight » Life | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: The best “Donkey Kong” player in the world dies all the time. It’s part of his plan. Dean Saglio, a 38-year-old real estate agent from Rhode Island, knows that the only way he’s going to break his high score (1,206,800) — again — is by taking huge risks throughout the game.
